comments.raw_text:
If selection starts at text node zero offsets and ends at other node then selection removal in editor doesn't remove text node from DOM but removes its content. It sounds like it doesn't make sense to keep that text node with no data in this case.

testcase: 
1) put caret at first line
2) twice down arrow
3) shift+down arrow to select text "On 11/17/2011 3:16 PM, bugzilla-daemon@mozilla.org wrote:"
4) delete it

There's a text node with no data used to contain "On 11/17/2011 ..." text.
